solution_line_template: Counting the cats he had, the kittens he found, and the injured cat, Jeff had a total of {initial_cats} + {kittens_found} + {injured_cat} = <<{initial_cats}+{kittens_found}+{injured_cat}={total_cats_before_adoption}>>{total_cats_before_adoption} cats.
{people_adopted} people took a total of {people_adopted} * {cats_per_person} = <<{people_adopted}*{cats_per_person}={total_cats_adopted}>>{total_cats_adopted} cats.
After Wednesday, Jeff was left with {total_cats_before_adoption} - {total_cats_adopted} = <<{total_cats_before_adoption}-{total_cats_adopted}={cats_remaining}>>{cats_remaining} cats.
